Package index

All functions

anki()
Hide/Show text
anki_setup()
Hide/Show text
convert()
Converts R Markdown file into HTML fragment with inline styles
convert_html2cms()
Convert a HTML file into a HTML block to be copied and pasted for CMS.

Counter factory.
